short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View all recent conversations from multiple inbox at one place

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BotOS is a chatbot builder platform, where users can build their chatbots for FB using a self-service portal. Also, business can setup their chatbot brand using this platform too.
